content:
The University of WisconsinWhitewater cruised past the Edinboro University mens wheelchair basketball team Thursday and advanced to the quarterfinals of the National Wheelchair Basketball Association Championships with a  win PERIOD

At halftime WisconsinWhitewater held a commanding  lead PERIOD

Picking up where the first half ended the Warhawks opened the second half with the same aggressive style of play and bullied their way under the rim where they scored most of their points PERIOD

Head coach Jeremy Lade said despite outscoring Edinboro by  the Warhawks werent looking to send a message to the other teams in the tournament PERIOD

Instead Lade was just pleased to give every player on the roster some minutes PERIOD

 Lade said PERIOD 

WisconsinWhitewater will play in the quarterfinals on Friday at  p.m PERIOD in the Maverick Activities Center PERIOD

Grizzygrant

grant.mckinleymavs.uta.edu
